channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Jon Bon Jovi helps talk woman down from ledge on Nashville bridge
item.description: Rock and Roll Hall of Famer Jon Bon Jovi and a video production assistant have talked down a woman standing on the ledge of a pedestrian bridge in Nashville.

item.title: Utah citizen initiatives at stake as judge weighs keeping major changes off ballots
item.description: A Utah judge promises to rule by Thursday on a proposed constitutional amendment that would empower the Republican-dominated state Legislature to override citizen initiatives.

item.title: A man accused of trying to set former co-workers on fire is charged with assault
item.description: Prosecutors have charged a Detroit man accused of trying to set two former co-workers on fire with multiple counts, including assault with intent to murder.
